code: import httpClient from'../common/http_common';import httpClientPut from'../common/http_common_put';var getAll=function getAll(){return httpClient.get("/posts");};var getByPage=function getByPage(page){var search=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"";return httpClient.get("/posts/page/".concat(page,"?search=").concat(search));};var create=function create(data){return httpClient.post("/posts",data);};var get=function get(id){return httpClient.get("/posts/detail/".concat(id));};var getTop=function getTop(id){return httpClient.get("/posts/top/".concat(id));};var getDefault=function getDefault(id){return httpClient.get("/posts/default/".concat(id));};var update=function update(id,data){return httpClientPut.put("/posts/".concat(id),data);};var remove=function remove(id){httpClient.delete("/posts/".concat(id));};var logger={getAll:getAll,get:get,getTop:getTop,getByPage:getByPage,create:create,remove:remove,update:update,getDefault:getDefault};export default logger;
